Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO SOCIAL SERVICES
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Increases the federal poverty level requirement for recipients where it concerns the one-time disregard of earned income
Summary: Increases the federal poverty level requirement for recipients where it concerns the one-time disregard of earned income following job entry.
LawCode: Amd ยง131-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to increasing the federal poverty level requirement for recipients of social services where it concerns the one-time disregard of earned income following job entry for up to six consecutive months
